title: N-Lotka Volterra
summary: Working on a research project studying multi-species ecosystems by analyzing simulation data to predict the general stability of ecosystem populations
comments: Intending to write a paper after the research to hopefully publish the results
The Lotka-Volterra model only handles 2 species, but it can be closely approximated using Euler's method to extend to N species.
Practicing writing in Python and using SQLAlchemy, and numpy.
Will be generating and working with BigData after migrating the running of simulations to use the GPU.
